Articles.Content: hey guys i wanted to try some cool mods and then i remembered on KSP Real solar System first i've started the game everything worked fine until it was finnished loading  until the little loading icon appeared on the right bottom of screen then it crashed(Installed mods SSRSSClouds_HighRes,SSRSS,The normal squad folder,Sigma dimensions, RSS-Textures,RealSolarSystem,ModularFlightIntegrator,Kronometer,Kopernicus)

Just To Clarify:;

we need a little more info and if its 1.4 with non 1.4 mods..yes it may not work
Please wait until the mods haves been updated for 1.4
